title: Permabanned for this? Seriously ?
body:
edit: Talked to Riot and they've decided  I'm #reformed and to lift my permanent ban :)
See you all on the Fields of Justice!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



 I wasn't flaming or insulting anyone or having a negative attitude and I got permanently banned

This is the only game that shows when I log in can post screenshots for proof but the point of this post is to get a Rioters attention who should be able to see I'm not omitting anything



Most of the typing was to my duo (zyra supp) and none of it was complaining 
-I didn't have a negative attitude, 
-the random jungler and top laner were joking around with me and my duo

-when i say "this is why you dont gank losing lanes " its because the enemy team is  dying to us bot while trying to gank us when we're winning lane, I'm not berating anyone on my team, and it's in ally chat to my friend, im not berating anyone  all chat

-my 0/8/4 fizz flames me for collecting my own wave bot lane swears at me  and i just tell him that he's trolling and he's useless (because he was, he was intentionally avoiding fights trying to cause us to lose because he spam pinged for ganks agains the enemy vlad, and our rengar didnt want to gank mid)

I don't understand why I would be permanently banned for this

 Please enlighten me 

I didn''t use a single insult, I wasn't complaining, I wasn't raging,  I didn't troll, so what did I do or say that infringed on the  safe space that is summoners rift ?

What is it that made me among the 0.0006% of players toxic enough to receive a permanent ban since my 14 day ban ?



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Game 1
In-Game
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
inyourdreamskid: wow lol
inyourdreamskid: lol of course your plant would steal that too
(ally chat, my irl friend is zyra )
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(all chat to trist )
inyourdreamskid: lol trist

(she responds with "im the saddest league of legends player right now lmao" or something like that iirc)
inyourdreamskid: its ok ur mid and jg will carry XD  (her mid and jg were fed af)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


--------------------------------
(ally chat to my jungle)

inyourdreamskid: better to push leads not bail out losers
-----------------------------------


(all chat)
inyourdreamskid: nvm not if they try to camp your lane XD

(ally chat)   (we killed them when they tried to gank us)
inyourdreamskid: that right there
inyourdreamskid: is why you dont gank losing lanes  
inyourdreamskid: lol

(my jungle thought I was talking to him for some reason)
inyourdreamskid: if you cant read english then i cant help you

(they come again and we kill them again) (again ally chat)
inyourdreamskid: they dont learn
inyourdreamskid: they keep coming here
inyourdreamskid: lmao

(still ally chat)  (they came bot AGAIN, this time it worked and they got us XD )
inyourdreamskid: damn i really thought theyd stop coming bot at this point lmao
inyourdreamskid: how come I never get baby sat like that

(i dont remember what chat or what this was about tbh )
inyourdreamskid: wtf is he doing lol

(this was all chat tho )
inyourdreamskid: pretty sure you had this game in the bag until you all decided to fista in the lost bot lane lol
inyourdreamskid: fiesta*
inyourdreamskid: shoulda camped winning lanes lol

(ally chat)
inyourdreamskid: damn
inyourdreamskid: did you see that 1 shot on tlaiyah LMAO
inyourdreamskid: I Q'd the minion and 1 shot her with my ult
inyourdreamskid: lol yeah
inyourdreamskid: 2nd time mf btw lmao
inyourdreamskid: irelia used e

I was doing golems botside , as bot wave pushed to me, fizz comes from base to run bot then rages / flames when i take the wave bot)

(to fizz ally chat after he rages about the cs )
inyourdreamskid: look at your map
inyourdreamskid: rotate properly

"complains he has no farm or kills"

inyourdreamskid: because you're garbage

(all chat)
inyourdreamskid: See we're stomping you and fizz is tilting and trolling XD imagine if instead of inting bot with your bot lane you camped him

(fizz continues to rage and says hes not trolling even ho he has 4 kill participation in a stomp, and is actively avoiding fights intentionally )

inyourdreamskid: your raging and trolling lol
inyourdreamskid: yeah i took farm as a useful player from aa useless player
inyourdreamskid: you have 4 kp you're intentionally not  showing in fights to try and lose lol
inyourdreamskid: thats not trolling ?
inyourdreamskid: what is your arguement here
inyourdreamskid: when we are ahead tremendously as a team
inyourdreamskid: you dont  need to catch up as an individual

* he keeps raging but i just ignore him and continue to push our win*


inyourdreamskid: group and end

(which is exactly what everyone except fizz did, we won the game without him , game literally ends right there while he's "catching up" and raging/flaming)
 
Post-Game

(someone on enemy team asks how their fed eve ended up feeding)

inyourdreamskid: she camped her losing bot  with her lead
inyourdreamskid: fizz you need to learn when you're tremendously ahead as a team, you being behind as an individual is irrleveant
inyourdreamskid: get over yourself and get out of your own way
inyourdreamskid: you'll win more games




edit:  https://imgur.com/a/mMQJMJH

In what way is this extremely toxic?

replies.body:
You called someone garbage, accused them of illiteracy, trolling, flamed them all game in general.

Right off a 14 day ban, after those you can be banned for almost anything; you far exceeded the requirements to get permed.

People who are apparently mentally incapable of identifying and correcting their behavior have to be removed, sorry. Better luck in fortnite, maybe?
LOL ^ {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Time to make a new account and be hella toxic to new players, thus driving them off and helping to kill the game. Let's be honest, that's what happens. It would be much better for the game if Riot just long-term muted people like you or gave you only certain phrases to say like Hearthstone for a few months.

the long term mute thing was tried by RIOT

it failed miserably
Completely false, permamute was never attempted

well here's what I'm going off off

From RIOT Tantrum: 

"It really breaks down into two categories.

1.) Helping players reform
2.) Shielding others from the behavior, at a cost.

We used to issue chat restrictions that **essentially scaled indefinitely**.

We were able to determine that after a certain point the penalty no longer helped with reform. The 10-game and 25-game counts for chat restrictions are based on data that they were both light enough, and felt strict enough to encourage people to understand their behavior is unacceptable in game and change it.

We also saw that the players in this 'large restriction' category defaulted to gameplay altering means of harassing their team. It caused an increase in feeding and trolling.

The sample size of this population and time frame is huge. Essentially the time spanning from the introduction of chat restrictions to the introduction of IFS."


what are you basing your claim on?
Why would he even need a permamute? did you even read OP's chat log ?

Char was replying to this post.

> [{quoted}](name=Veralion,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-08-26T10:39:55.458+0000)
>
> Time to make a new account and be hella toxic to new players, thus driving them off and helping to kill the game. Let's be honest, that's what happens. It would be much better for the game if Riot just long-term muted people like you or gave you only certain phrases to say like Hearthstone for a few months.


As this person was tlaking about longterm mutes.

Tantrum's argument is pretty pathetic. If they know that there is an increase in feeding and trolling, then they know who is doing it. They could simply ban those who are feeding and trolling, then leave indefinite chat restrictions reserved for offenses committed in chat. 

Stupid argument.

ok well if you want to write off what RIOT says without any evidence of your own that's up to you

but your counter-argument of "thats stupid" wont get you far

Why would I need more evidence when I went completely off of what Tantrum said? If that isn't evidence then YOU are the one suggesting that he is lying. lol

If they can PROVE that there is an increase in "feeding and trolling", then they could also prove who is committing the act. How else would they know that there is an increase in "feeding and trolling"? EVEN IF that isn't the case, it wouldn't be too hard to put a chat restricted player on a priority list. So that if they get reported a couple of times for intentional feeding, they get bumped up on that list to get investigated and permanently banned. 

It isn't like a longer chat restriction will make the inting problem any worse than it already is. In my last 11 solo ranked games, I had 4 games where someone was intentionally trying to lose. It is already about as bad as it can get.

> [{quoted}](name=CRlT,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2018-08-28T14:06:20.881+0000)
>
> Completely false, permamute was never attempted

He didn't say permamute. He said long time.... as in thousands of games.
I have been here since Season 3, and there's never been such a thing, at least at that point. The Tribunal punishments were the same as now, more or less. 1 less chat ban. Then Perma.

> [{quoted}](name=Illabethe,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=00040000000000010000,timestamp=2018-09-05T09:37:53.812+0000)
>
> I have been here since Season 3, and there's never been such a thing, at least at that point. The Tribunal punishments were the same as now, more or less. 1 less chat ban. Then Perma.

Thanks for the random info that I already knew?
Be honest. You're just like him. And me. We all have games where we talk like this or MUCH MUCH worse. Claiming anything else would be an utter lie.

> [{quoted}](name=Illabethe,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2018-09-05T09:10:04.026+0000)
>
> Be honest. You're just like him. And me. We all have games where we talk like this or MUCH MUCH worse. Claiming anything else would be an utter lie.

I appreciate the sentiment fam :)    Riot surprisingly actually gave me anothe chance and lifted my perma, I won't be typing anything any time soon, see you on the fields of justice :D

_inyourdreamskid: if you cant read english then i cant help you_


Apparently you are unable to read English, because I'm pretty sure the Rules are written in English, and when you got your 14 day ban, you were warned to change your behavior on the punishment card, which was also written in English, amirite?

But no, you come off a 2week ban and first thing you do is calling people garbage.
Sorry no empathy or sympathy for you, players like you are the toxins in this community, and I'm glad Riot removed you from the game for good. We don't need people like you in this game. Bye.
I have multiple accounts no one was removed lmao  I would never end up in your little silver 4 games, don't worry yourself LOL

> [{quoted}](name=inyourdreamskid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-08-30T14:00:41.481+0000)
>
> I have multiple accounts no one was removed lmao  I would never end up in your little silver 4 games, don't worry yourself LOL

No, but you end up banned and apparently it upsets you personally enough to make a forum thread about it soooooo....

No sympathy for your tears, kid. Stay banned.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Imagine a life so sad you seek grief on message boards to make yourself feel good XDDDDD

> [{quoted}](name=inyourdreamskid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-01T23:28:43.702+0000)
>
> Imagine a life so sad you seek grief on message boards to make yourself feel good XDDDDD

Imagine a life so sad, you have to make multiple new accounts, because nobody wants to play with you, not even the game company itself wants you to play their game XDDDDDDD

1 random kid I carried didn't want to play with me boo hoo, I've been playing with irl friends all week  http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=crlt

again I repeat, Imagine a life so sad you seek grief on message boards to make yourself feel good 

good luck in silver 4 XD

> [{quoted}](name=inyourdreamskid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=000500000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-02T21:32:02.331+0000)
>
> 1 random kid I carried didn't want to play with me boo hoo, I've been playing with irl friends all week  http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=crlt
> 
> again I repeat, Imagine a life so sad you seek grief on message boards to make yourself feel good 
> 
> good luck in silver 4 XD

And yet, it upsets you to the point that you felt the need to write a thread on the boards about it, AND you still feel the need to answer every single post I make on your thread. Pretty sad life for someone who calls other people's life sad, tbh XDDDD

Oh I can't wait until the same exact happens to you. In reality the OP has one of the tamest chats I've seen in a long time.... tamer than most games posted by Youtubers. If you want to grief, go ahead. But some day it's going to be you writing the post.
And yet you feel the need to keep posting here. Guess who's unbanned? XD

> [{quoted}](name=inyourdreamskid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=00050000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-09-05T09:05:31.638+0000)
>
> And yet you feel the need to keep posting here. Guess who's unbanned? XD

And yet, you are still replying to everything I say, because you just can't stand the possibility of letting me have the satisfaction that I beat you at your own game XD 
funny and sad at the same time. Can't wait for your next reply XDDDDDD

> [{quoted}](name=Fegone,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=000500000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-09-05T13:57:34.600+0000)
>
> And yet, you are still replying to everything I say, because you just can't stand the possibility of letting me have the satisfaction that I beat you at your own game XD 
> funny and sad at the same time. Can't wait for your next reply XDDDDDD





I am not banned anymore, how have you won? XD

> [{quoted}](name=inyourdreamskid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=0005000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2018-09-05T16:09:42.139+0000)
>
> I am not banned anymore, how have you won? XD

THEEEEERE it is, the answer you can't help but write, just like you will write another answer to this one, because you can't admit defeat in this psychological warfare.
You have only 3 options at this point:

1)  ignore my latest response, don't answer, but now and forever have the feeling and knowledge that I won. And that is something you can't live with, as I have already proven many times so far.
2) write another answer to this thread, continuing the spiraling movement downwards towards an infinite and lone process of downvoting the other, followed by a meaningless response post just to avoid admitting defeat. This scenario is still a win for me though. If you need clarification on why, I suggest to watch the ending of Dr. Strange for a very good illustration of the winning concept of this particular scenario.
3) trying the easy way out, proclaiming something along the lines of : "I don't have time for this any more, I won't answer any more", effectively trying to remove yourself from the conversation without showing defeat. Now this option has been eliminated since I already predicted it as one of your possible moves to win this battle.  You would show defeat if you used it and you know it, as well as I do.

So now what will it be? 1) or 2) ?

> [{quoted}](name=Fegone,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=00050000000000000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-05T17:33:40.893+0000)
>
> THEEEEERE it is, the answer you can't help but write, just like you will write another answer to this one, because you can't admit defeat in this psychological warfare.

> 
> 1)  ignore my latest response, don't answer, but now and forever have the feeling and knowledge that I won. And that is something you can't live with, as I have already proven many times so far.
> 2) write another answer to this thread, continuing the spiraling movement downwards towards an infinite and lone process of downvoting the other, followed by a meaningless response post just to avoid admitting defeat. This scenario is still a win for me though. If you need clarification on why, I suggest to watch the ending of Dr. Strange for a very good illustration of the winning concept of this particular scenario.
> 3) trying the easy way out, proclaiming something along the lines of : "I don't have time for this any more, I won't answer any more", effectively trying to remove yourself from the conversation without showing defeat. Now this option has been eliminated since I already predicted it as one of your possible moves to win this battle.  You would show defeat if you used it and you know it, as well as I do.
> 
> So now what will it be? 1) or 2) ?

Too long, didn't read, save your essays for college kid XD

You just got off a 14 day and it took 1 game for you to call someone garbage and not understand why you got perma'd?

do you not know how the punishment system works?

I played like 20 games + since being banned , this is the only game I was banned for since being banned for 14 days but sure make assumptions like that 

wow I typed "garbage" a single time to someone swearing at me, the humanity! get him out of here!

> [{quoted}](name=inyourdreamskid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Vt0eNj4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-08-26T03:42:13.892+0000)
>
> wow I typed "garbage" a single time to someone swearing at me, the humanity! get him out of here!

You spent the entire game arguing, and then called someone garbage.

And since people are on thin ice when coming off a 14 day, you deserve it, byebye

I spent the entire game arguing? Feel free to quote the arguement

I sent like what 4 messages total to our toxic raging fizz?

he finished 1/9/5 in a 99 kill game, he was intentionally avoiding fights to try to make us lose.   But sure I said he's useless and garbage when he flamed me  for farming my own lane so I should be banned lmao
Are you... serious? Do you know what an insult is even?

It's not the matter of what you said this game or two or even three.
This is something you do consistently. Riot doesn't give you the chats for every single game you've been reported in. Riot is giving you examples of your most recent games you've been reported in what you're penalized for.

You weren't banned for this game. This game was an example of you were penalized for, and that's for your attitude in general during your duration of using Riot's service. This penalty was your very last penalty limit for the account you were borrowing from Riot. The thing is, if you disregard Riot's policy (Terms of Use), they're just going to disregard your access of the account you agreed with the terms on.

I love this, thank you for posting it, Good luck with your perma 

shoulda used  the mute button or not type at all, but you done diddly don messed up

Rip Bro.

make a new account and learn or  retire league :D

lol sure I typed "useless" and "garbage" im a horrible person


I have other accounts

this is just the first 2 minutes of chat on my first game since being banned 
https://imgur.com/a/wYtBbBg


sorry i breached the safe space with "useless garbage" i LMAO

lol like it's RIOTs fault your account was literally walking on a razors edge after your 14 day and you screwed up again

HOW DARE THEY?!?!?!?

" Oh look ima show this random screenshot of OTHER people in my game typing nonsense" 

ummm okay???. what good does that do? You still got the perma  ban because YOU did it, what is showing other peoples log gonna do? 

yeah okay so they type useless stuff to? yeah but were  they also coming off of a 14 day ban?

 nope you were and you still used chat, so again

you done diddly don messed up

Rip Bro.

Yes I love it, and you continue  the toxic, its just too easy.

Yeah this is boards account why would I play on this if i have a D5.

also please  continue.

talks about weeb,  *comes on board to say Permabanned for this? Seriously ?, tries to remove a perma

lmao just like your name implies

in your  dreams kid.
dang, sorry for roasting you to hard. rip bro

I mean you already lost cause you got the permaban :)

you actually commenting and replying back to me is entertainment 

so keep going

the only thing thats cute is your name "  kid " .

Its like watching a hamster running in a wheel, you are soo entertaining bro 

please Cry and try to start more keyboard wars, meanwhile 

inyourdreamskid=perma

everytime you reply its nothing but laughter from me, and laughter is healthy so thank you for that bro

loooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooool
Me currently playing league of legends as we speak is entertainment, you're just semi-amusing XD
damn you really DO have a lot of accounts, no wonder people who are trying to talk some sense into you are being downvoted so badly. You really are too obvious
what are you even talking about? who cares about votes ? LOL
